dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 202 IH: To amend the Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Act of 1992 to rename a site of the park.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Turner introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Act of 1992 to rename a site of the park.

section.header: Amendment to the Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Act of 1992
section.text: Section 101(b)(5) of the Dayton Aviation Heritage Preservation Act of 1992 (16 U.S.C. 410ww(b)(5)) is amended by striking Aviation Center and inserting National Museum.
